entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:46 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 06:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this morning then to snow or ice pellets this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
